title: Correlations between the anti-corrosion properties and the photocatalytic behavior of epoxy coatings incorporating modified graphene oxide deposited on a zinc substrate
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,10826-10841
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00413B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Tamara-Rita Ovari, Boglárka Trufán, Gabriel Katona, Gabriella Szabó, Liana Maria Muresan
Modified GO NPs were added to EP coatings on Zn to study their electrochemical, photocatalytic, and morphological properties. The Zn/EP-GO-APTES system showed the best organic pollutant degradation, keeping good corrosion resistance and adhesion.
